name: Yahoo! Finance
description: Miami-based leader in eco-friendly modular construction, announced a significant corporate milestone: a 200% year-over-year increase in inquiries for its patented hurricane-resistant, energy-efficient modular building systems.

name: La Vanguardia
description: The key is to combine accelerated construction with full financing

name: Tech Bullion
description: By prefabricating these components off-site, DDC Developments streamlines on-site assembly, enabling projects to be completed in months rather than years.

name: Business Insider
description: In a region where hurricanes and climate challenges dominate headlines, DDC Developments emerges as a game-changer for South Florida’s real estate landscape.

name: Barchart
description: Beyond resilience, DDC prioritizes energy efficiency. The panels’ superior insulation reduces heating and cooling demands by 30%, aligning with global green building certifications like LEED.
